mapper.select: select * from schedule where c_code=#{c_code} and u_id=#{u_id} and to_char(s_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from schedule where to_char(s_start,'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate-(interval '2' day), 'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.update: update schedule set s_arrive = sysdate where s_code = #{s_code} and c_code = #{c_code} and u_id=#{u_id}
update schedule set s_leave = sysdate where s_code = #{s_code} and c_code = #{c_code} and u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.select: select * from schedule where s_start >= to_date(#{s_start}, 'YYYYMMDD') and s_start < to_date(#{s_start},'YYYYMMDD')+7 and c_code=#{c_code} and u_id=#{u_id}
